document_data.caption: Melineth as a [[ghazneth]]
document_data.name: Melineth Turcassan
document_data.alignment2e: [[Neutral evil]]{{Cite dragon annual/1999/The Dragon's Bestiary: Ghazneths|118}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Melineth Turcassan''' was the father-in-law of King [[Duar Obarskyr]] of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History:
When Duar took an army north to battle the [[orc]] invaders in the [[King's Forest]], Melineth sold the city of [[Suzail]] to pirates for 500 sacks of [[gold]].

After fleeing from [[Cormyr]], it was unknown what happened to him. Eventually he died and was interred underneath a buckeye tree where he became the fourth [[Ghazneth]].
document_data.Relationships: Melineth Turcassan was Queen [[Daverna Turcassan|Daverna]]’s father<ref> and King [[Duar]]’s father-in-law.
document_data.As a Ghazneth: As a [[Ghazneth]], Melineth had the power of decay. He was able to cause extreme decay with a single touch, causing muscle to melt away, and instantly causing living matter to decay to the point of death.
